definitions.definition: An adult sexually attracted to prepubescent children .
An adult who is sexually attracted to or engages in sexual acts with a child under the age of consent.

main_definition: ( psychiatry , sexology ) An adult sexually attracted to prepubescent children . [from 20th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , common use ) An adult who is sexually attracted to or engages in sexual acts with a child under the age of consent.
